Class TurnListElement

it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.graphics.info.TurnListElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICliRenderable
public class TurnListElement extends FramedElement
Represents the list of players in the game, their scores and the current player playing.

    • setCurrTurnIndex

      public void setCurrTurnIndex(int currTurnIndex)
      Sets the current game turn.
      Parameters:
      currTurnIndex - current turn.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String username, int score, boolean isClient)
      Adds a new player to the list of players.
      Parameters:
      username - player's username.
      score - player's score.
      isClient - true if the player is the one viewing the CLI.

    • updateConnectionStatus

      public void updateConnectionStatus(String username, boolean isDisconnected)
      Updates the connection status of a player.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to update.
      isDisconnected - true if the player has disconnected from the game.

    • updatePlayerScore

      public void updatePlayerScore(String username, int score)
      Updates the score of the specified player.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to update.
      score - updated score.

    • updateGameState

      public void updateGameState(boolean isGameOver)
      Updates the status of the game. If the game is over, shows all players' scores.
      Parameters:
      isGameOver - true if the game is over.
